data.eml:eml: A new species of Aulacus (Hymenoptera, Aulacidae) from Hokkaido, Japan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kuroda, Keita, Kikuchi, Namiki, Konishi, Kazuhiko (2016): A new species of Aulacus (Hymenoptera, Aulacidae) from Hokkaido, Japan. Journal of Hymenoptera Research 53: 171-180, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.53.11027, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.53.11027
